title: S3 EP14: Truer Lies with Dule Hill
description:
This week, Maggie and Tim are joined by Dule Hill to talk about Season Three Episode Fourteen: Truer Lies. The one where Shawn and Gus help out a compulsive liar who claims he overheard an assassination plot at dinner one night.

Sponsors:
